channel.title: Quick question [Woops, Realized something - Misclicked...WRONG SECTION.]
channel.description:
Heyy, I remember DS, Those days. ;D
Back when I [b]WASN'T[/b] IPed...
I was wondering.. Could someone do what Blind did for Steven?
Like, In the client, have the admin icon next to their name if they're admin.. Mod if they're mod... None if regular player...
Here's a pic of what I mean. [IMG]http://i478.photobucket.com/albums/rr144/Anfernio_/Screenshot8.png[/img]
Lul, Deltascape admin plz. :P

item.title: Quick question [Woops, Realized something - Misclicked...WRONG SECTION.]
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

It’s easy. Webber already did it, and released in his client. He was the first to do it actually…

Read full topic
